biography.bio: Helmut Käutner was born on March 25, 1908 in Düsseldorf, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany as Paul Günther Helmut Käutner. He was a director and writer, known for The Captain from Köpenick (1956), The Devil's General (1955) and Le dernier pont (1954). He was married to Erica Balqué. He died on April 20, 1980 in Castellina in Chianti, Tuscany, Italy.
biography.name: Helmut Käutner

biography.bio: Curt Bois was born on April 5, 1901 in Berlin, Germany. He was an actor and director, known for Casablanca (1942), Wings of Desire (1987) and Das Boot ist voll (1981). He was married to Dagmar and Hedy Ury. He died on December 25, 1991 in Berlin.
biography.name: Curt Bois

biography.birthName: Käte Lisbeth Minna Sophie Isolde Haack
biography.bio: Käthe Haack was born on August 11, 1897 in Berlin, Germany as Käte Lisbeth Minna Sophie Isolde Haack. She was an actress, known for Émile et les détectives (1931), No Greater Love (1952) and The Adventures of Baron Munchausen (1943). She was married to Heinrich Schroth. She died on May 5, 1986 in West Berlin, West Germany.
biography.name: Käthe Haack

biography.bio: Erika von Thellmann was born on August 31, 1902 in Leutschau, Austria-Hungary. She was an actress, known for The Good Soldier Schweik (1960), Willi Manages the Whole Thing (1972) and Leben wie die Fürsten (1966). She was married to Tino Pattiera. She died on October 27, 1988 in Calw, Baden-Württemberg, West Germany.
biography.name: Erika von Thellmann

biography.bio: Friedel Schuster was born on May 12, 1904. She is known for her work on Waldhausstraße 20 (1960), Victoria and Her Hussar (1931) and Die Liebe des Jahres (1959). She was married to Iván Petrovich. She died on January 20, 1983 in Mendig, Rhineland-Palatinate, West-Germany.
biography.name: Friedel Schuster

biography.bio: Georg Braun is an actor, known for Der trojanische Sessel (1971), Zwei Tage von vielen (1964) and Auf den Spuren der Anarchisten (1972).
biography.name: Georg Braun

biography.placeOfBirth: Free City of Danzig [now Gdansk, Pomorskie, Poland]
biography.bio: Käte Jaenicke was born on March 22, 1928 in Free City of Danzig. She was an actress, known for The Tin Drum (1979), Angry Harvest (1985) and Seraphine oder Die wundersame Geschichte der Tante Flora (1965). She died on November 1, 2002 in Munich, Bavaria, Germany.
biography.name: Käte Jaenicke

biography.bio: Renate Grosser was born on September 18, 1927 in Berlin, Germany as Renate Großer-Mühling. She is an actress, known for Autumn Milk (1989), Eisblumen (2011) and À fond, la musique (2005).
biography.name: Renate Grosser

biography.bio: Ewald Wenck was born on December 28, 1891 in Berlin, Germany as Hermann Ewald Wenck. He was an actor, known for Ce diable de garçon (1944), Das Geschenk (1935) and Vom Regen in die Traufe (1937). He died on April 30, 1981 in West Berlin, West Germany.
biography.name: Ewald Wenck

biography.bio: Peter Schiff was born on June 27, 1923 in Neustrelitz, Germany. He was an actor, known for Drei Damen vom Grill (1977), Für alle Fälle Stefanie (1995) and L'âge d'or (1981). He was married to Gisela. He died on April 16, 2014 in Berlin, Germany.
biography.name: Peter Schiff

biography.bio: Margot Franken is an actress, known for Bimbo the Great (1958), Der trojanische Sessel (1971) and Betreten verboten (1972).
biography.name: Margot Franken

biography.bio: Paul Kuhn was born on March 12, 1928 in Wiesbaden, Hesse, Germany. He is known for his work on Treffpunkt Berlin (1969), Pauls Silvesterparty (1970) and Am Klavier im Studio 4 (1966). He was married to Ute Hellermann. He died on September 23, 2013 in Bad Wildungen, Hesse.
biography.name: Paul Kuhn

biography.bio: Toni Herbert was born in 1912. He was an actor, known for Doppelspiel (1972), In Sachen Erzberger gegen Helfferich (1967) and Prozeß Medusa (1976). He died in January 1990 in Berlin, Germany.
biography.name: Toni Herbert

biography.bio: Tanja Ziegler is an actress, known for Der trojanische Sessel (1971), I Had a Feeling I Was Dead (1973) and Heiratskandidaten (1975).
biography.name: Tanja Ziegler

biography.bio: Hans Pössenbacher was born on July 14, 1895 in Graz, Styria, Austria-Hungary as Hans Pawlow. He was an actor, known for Piroschka (1960), Shock Troop (1934) and Something for Everyone (1970). He was married to Irene Carol. He died on February 24, 1979 in Munich, Bavaria, West Germany.
biography.name: Hans Pössenbacher
